website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking a smaller option will be happy with this lightweight and affordable pack.
pros: Many owners appreciate the smaller design
Offers easy-access exterior pocket for smaller items and valuables with a larger main compartment

customer_reviews.title: Burton - not the good stuff anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these Burton backpacks over the years. I am very disappointed how Burton decided to go so cheap on the overall construction of this years backpack. The fabric is thinner. It doesn’t hold it shape as well. The fabric is flimsy, doesn’t feel durable like the old, overlapping fabric of zipper got caught in zipper when testing out. This doesn’t happen with the old. The zipping area is smaller (see photos). It’s here now I will keep. I will update review when it fails. I will not buy Burton again!
customer_reviews.author: gary d

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Broke in the First 5 Days
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Burton bag, though I won't buy Burton, again. The first day I used it, one of the zippers got stuck on the nylon material, and came off the track when I tried to fix it. On the third day I used the backpack, the other zipper got stuck, just the same as the first zipper. Goodbye, Burton.
customer_reviews.author: AEO

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is terrible. Always breaking and getting stuck. Beautiful backpack with great space and lightweight. Unfortunately a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is the bomb! but. . .
customer_reviews.text: I use this for school and I love it! This backpack for traveling is also very convenient. It's light weight and I love using it! the only con to this is that there are only two pockets, I love pockets so the fact that there are only two, it saddens me.( the reason why I rated it 4) It also doesn't have a spot to put my water bottle in, which I need a water bottle 100% of the time in school.
customer_reviews.author: SelHer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with that backpack the minute I saw it! Looks exactly as in the pictures. I had it with me for a few flights already, it still looks as new. Very comfortable, no matter if it's full and heavy or almost empty.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found a lightweight backpack for a great price. For some reason when I came across this backpack it was $8. I couldn't pass it up as I needed a backpack to carry my macbook. It's been great so far! I have even taken it on a day trip to Disneyland. It is light and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Junswifey

customer_reviews.title: and it can hold a good amount of items
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it daily since I've bought the backpack, and it can hold a good amount of items. I can store a laptop, speakers, textbooks, flashlight, coffee mug, water bottles, and spare clothes if I really wanted too. Just a s*** ton of space to work with. :D

customer_reviews.title: Different from the rest of the backpacks you see other using!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, love the color scheme. The back part of the backpack (the one that touches your back when wearing it) feels a bit uncomfortable because of the thick patch of gold going across the backpack. Other than that, this backpack seems very sturdy. It would be nice if it had some smaller pockets inside the small front pocket or some side mesh pockets for bottles.
customer_reviews.author: John Huang

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Burton backpack. Burton's always my favorite. Their bags are very good quality. Most of their backpacks are pretty big. I like the size of this one better. It will be perfect if they add side pockets like their other series of backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: L. LAI

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight everyday backpack
customer_reviews.text: Got this for work so I have something to store my laptop and water bottle in. Works great. Front pocket is a nice addition for pens, laptop charger, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Sheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag for the price sort of worried when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag for the price sort of worried when I was picking the kettle pack out that it would be too small but for my 5'2 size. (i did not want to feel like a child while carrying this around campus) yet it feels quite average and not too short. i like that it actually fits my laptop quite comfortably and I enjoy that the laptop sleeve is raised so my computer will not hit the floor when i set the bag on the ground. other then that its pretty much a standard "jansport" sized bag and i enjoy that i can fit a lot and still not have it feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Leos

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is made from great materials, and feels durable. I feel the design is too simple, could use a few more pockets (for example, side pockets)
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE LEYBA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack-as all Burton stuff is. Great price. Perfect size for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my son. The price was great for a Burton backpack and of course the quality of this backpack is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy for a simple backpack, it's just slightly big for my size. Im 5'7' 130 lbs. very lightly padded back, so not the most comfortable. I Dont like that it only has 2 pockets but I knew that when I was purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: GabriellaR

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bag. We are actually using as a diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bag. We are actually using as a diaper bag as opposed to a traditional diaper bag or a laptop bag. It's great; very spacious and easy to access all compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality backpack - zippers stick a lot and feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a great quality backpack - zippers stick a lot and feel like they'll break within a year. Wouldn't recommend for everyday use - but for the price (I purchased when it was a Gold Box item) it's a great day pack for hiking in dusty or muddy areas that I'd rather spare my nicer pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: Love Burton and LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love Burton and LOVE this bag. I use this daily...hiking, walking around the city, riding my bike, and weekend trips.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a good sized, no frills bag
customer_reviews.text: Chest strap is REALLY high. Otherwise a good sized, no frills bag.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Get a Herschel bag if you want quality
customer_reviews.text: Only bought it for the design. Herschel bags are much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jäger

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my backpack. I get compliments on it everywhere. It's great for school and for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Postma

customer_reviews.title: ... video on YouTube and just thought how durable and good looking it was
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this backpack from a "What's in my bag" video on YouTube and just thought how durable and good looking it was. Finally decided to get it after my former backpack decide to tear on me. Great for every day college life!
customer_reviews.author: Farica Yang

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery, wonderful product. Bag is more green than teal though as it looks teal on the site. Better quality than similar bags.
customer_reviews.author: Roland George

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son. He really likes the style and size. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BACKPACK
customer_reviews.text: The kettle pack is a great bag for students, especially students in high school and college! It has a pocket for a laptop, and I use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: The bag I got looks nothing like the bag in the picture it’s gray and white ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag I got looks nothing like the bag in the picture it’s gray and white and also is a very small bag . My 12 year old son was really bummed because he picked this on amazon and used his own money to get it for his School books and it will not work for that . ( we bought him something else )
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Failed on first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack for use walking around Disney World and the zipper kept getting caught in the material covering the zipper. I had to cut a notch in the cover to get the zipper to work so that I could open the pack. Eventually both zippers failed and I couldn't close the pack at all. I carried the pack around Disney all day by hand. It was useless as a pack - even for very light duty.
customer_reviews.author: PC100

customer_reviews.title: but it became the perfect fit for all my fishing tackle and is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a smaller backpack than i thought, but it became the perfect fit for all my fishing tackle and is perfect for smaller objects.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Down to basics...
customer_reviews.text: As a medium size, light duty item, this Burton kettle backpack, is a good choice for a small school-related load or a short day outdoors. I find that the gray fabric used in the front portion of the backpack is too thin. The backpack features a basic front pocket, a large, non-compartmentalized main storage area with a small padded pocket that can fit an iPad. The back and the straps are generously padded. As for the seams, they appear solidly sewn. As a light-duty backpack, it can sustain some basic abuse. However, I would not consider it for heavier loads or a prolonged exposure to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni T.

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable backpack with nice storage whether it be for school or as a way to lug a laptop and gear around. You can see by the pictures that there is a front pocket that is nice and roomy. It will actually easily fit a tablet or iPad along with chargers, a bluetooth keyboard, etc. The main compartment is also roomy and has a big pocket that a laptop would easily slide into and can be secured via the velcro strap. The back straps also secure at the bottom around the waste for added support in case you have a heavy load. It's definitely cool. A good replacement for my backpack which is fraying, ripping, and tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: The color is nice and neutral also
customer_reviews.text: The sternum strap is the biggest plus for me on this, because those just make it so much easier to carry anything beyond the lightest amount of weight. The color is nice and neutral also, and the straps have a reasonable amount of padding. It feels more roomy than some models I've used that have a lot more little pockets and such for organizing, so I guess that's a trade-off because every pocket they add takes up a little more space in itself. On the whole, though, it's a nice bag
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, light duty pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking medium sized backpack. It does have a slightly padded back section that will hold a tablet or smaller laptop. Other than that, it has a largish back pocket that would hold a small notebook and quite a few writing utensils...not organized, just all in the pocket. The colors are nice. The fabric seems thin, as other reviewers have mentioned. For a light-duty pack, this is quite acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R. Arnholt

customer_reviews.title: Backpack Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: The backpack, while clearly modeled after a Herschel, is actually far more durable and can hold much more. The straps are sturdy but it doesn't sacrifice looks for functionality. It's equally suitable for back-to-school or for a leisurely hiking trip but the picture does make it seem bigger than it is in real life. As long as you're not trekking K2 or backpacking across Eastern Europe, this is a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Ogr8ys1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this backpack. The materials are extremely nice and the design is attractive. It's very comfortable with nice padded straps. There is a smaller pocket on the outside to fit phones, keys, earphones, etc. The inside is for books, a small laptop, and bigger items. It's suitable for both males and females. The price is right for the quality and workmanship. I really like it a lot and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, I am going to use it as my carry on when we go on family trips. I like the size and the amount of pockets it has. I love the colors of it. Burton is a great brand name, and a VT company, so I love to support smaller businesses. I am very happy with the quality of the product and the look of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

product_meta.title: Burton Kettle Backpack Mens
product_meta.description: Pile your laptop, charger, gym clothes, and lunch into the Burton Kettle 20L Backpack and you're out the door. This classic school backpack has a large main pocket, an external accessory pocket, and a padded laptop compartment. The shoulder straps are designed for comfort, even when it feels like you have the entire library on your back.
feature_bullets: Pockets: 1 int Laptop Compartment (15" diagonally) slip, 1 ext zip, 1 exterior
